utils¶

set_to_list¶

Converts a set to a list

Parameters:

Name

Description

Type

Default

value_set

target set

set

None

Returns: list

Example:

from matritools import utils as mu

values = [1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 ]

set_list = mu.set_to_list(set(values))

print(set_list)
# output
# [1,2,3]

print(set_list[0])
# output
# 1
